QuestData.Title: Lost and Tormented
QuestData.Description:
Our citizens here in Ramkahen have managed to escape the brunt of N'Zoth's assault.
Our brothers in the Lost City were not so fortunate. Those not immediately slain have been held captive only to be tortured by N'Zoth's minions.
I know that you will be taking the fight to N'Zoth's forces. If you can free our allies as well, Ramkahen will be in your debt.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free $1oa Ramkahen Citizens from Torment Cells within the Lost City of Tol'vir in Uldum.
